ai-tika-abh06t0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-abh06t0:4_0: The Realised Ones, Uttara, the Realised One,
ai-tika-abh06t0:5_0: Having worshipped the Buddha, the Dhamma and the great Buddha,
ai-tika-abh06t0:8_0: while sitting in the cool of the King of Devas,
ai-tika-abh06t0:10_0: which were surrounded by gods and men,
ai-tika-abh06t0:11_0: preached the Dhamma to the godly realm of gods.
ai-tika-abh06t0:13_0: for which I drew near Pāṭaligāma.
ai-tika-abh06t0:14_0: were satisfied by the Lord of the Death, and incomparable
ai-tika-abh06t0:16_0: fleing through the door of the simile of the door,
ai-tika-abh06t0:19_0: who is greater ascending to cross over the flood,
ai-tika-abh06t0:20_0: which is more than the waters, like a champion’s flame.
ai-tika-abh06t0:22_0: give alms-food in the teaching of the elephants,
ai-tika-abh06t0:23_0: I will tell you what should be fortunate for them.
